text.div:
Zika Virus Disease (Tests for Zika virus IgM Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    80618-2 Zika virus IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunoassay
    80619-0 Zika virus IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    80823-8 Zika virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunoassay
    80824-6 Zika virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    82731-1 Zika virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunofluorescence
    87622-7 Zika virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunoassay
    89369-3 Zika virus non-structural protein 1 IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    89370-1 Zika virus non-structural protein 1 IgM Ab [Interpretation] in Serum by Immunoassay
    89591-2 Zika virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunofluorescence
    91678-3 Zika virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
